special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, you may return it to its owner’s hand.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn’t blocked, you may put a creature card with lesser mana value from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
 Level 3
​
